scripts.deploy:dodoex_bsc: graph codegen subgraphs/dodoex_bsc.yaml --output-dir ./src/types/ && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.bscgraph.org/ --node https://api.bscgraph.org/deploy dodoex-v2 subgraphs/dodoex_bsc.yaml
scripts.deploy:dodoex_kovan: graph codegen subgraphs/dodoex_kovan.yaml --output-dir ./src/types/ && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ autarkxu/dodoex-v2 subgraphs/dodoex_kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:dodoex_mainnet: graph codegen subgraphs/dodoex_mainnet.yaml --output-dir ./src/types/ && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dodoex/dodoex-v2 subgraphs/dodoex_mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:dodoex_mainnet_test: graph codegen subgraphs/dodoex_mainnet.yaml --output-dir ./src/types/ && graph deploy --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ autarkxu/dodo_v2_test09 subgraphs/dodoex_mainnet.yaml
